title: JOIN_DATA_LIST
description: Returns a Data List from the specified Executable and performs a cross-join with the current Executableâ€™s source records.

parameters.name: executable_api_name
parameters.description: The API name of the Executable that provides the Data List to join.

examples:
-- Source Object Name: Opportunity
-- Target Object Name: OpportunityLineItem
-- Action: Insert

-- In the Scoping stage, define:
JOIN_DATA_LIST("ProductDataList")
-- Select at least one Opportunit and run the Data List Action, A pop-up window will appear where the user can choose Products to perform the cross join and create OpportunityLineItems.

tips.text: Defines this function during the Scoping stage to retrieve and prepare data for subsequent use in the Mapping stage.
